headline: Bain Raises Offer for Fuji Soft in $4.3 Billion Contest With KKR
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Bain Capital is increasing its offer for Fuji Soft Inc. with a bid that values the Japanese software company at $4.3 billion, extending a rare battle with KKR & Co. in the country’s booming buyout market. headline: Bain to raise offer for Fuji Soft to 9,600 yen a share, above KKR's bid, Nikkei says
summary: U.S. private equity firm Bain Capital is set to raise its offer price for Fuji Soft to 9,600 yen from 9,450 yen to counter KKR's tender offer bid, the Nikkei business daily reported on Wednesday. ...
